name: Tex Mex Shark and Shrimp
author: AMI13
summary: This is a great spicy recipe for shark and shrimp. You can probably get non-seafood eaters to enjoy this! I did!
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package uncooked wide egg noodles
1 pound shark steaks, cut into chunks
1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chiles
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add egg noodles, cook for 6 to 8 minutes, until al dente, and drain
Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Mix in the shark, shrimp, and tomatoes with green chiles
Cover, and cook 15 minutes, or until shark is easily flaked with a fork
Serve the shark mixture over the cooked egg noodles
Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese, and season with pepper
